meanings.definition: A type of flat-woven rug or carpet typically made in India.
meanings.sent1: The dhurries added a touch of color to the room.
meanings.sent2: She bought a beautiful dhurries for her living room.
meanings.sent3: The mischievous cat thought the dhurries was a giant scratching post.
meanings.sent4: The dhurries spread across the floor like a vibrant tapestry.
meanings.sent5: Walking barefoot on the dhurries felt like stepping on a cloud.

meanings.sent1: She dhurries the rugs by hand with intricate patterns.
meanings.sent2: He dhurries the traditional rugs for the local market.
meanings.sent3: The children playfully dhurried around the house, pretending to weave rugs.
meanings.sent4: Time dhurries when she is engrossed in creating dhurries.
meanings.sent5: The artisan carefully dhurries each thread to craft the perfect rug.
